Fable.Title: Crypt of Shadows
Fable.Description: An ancient crypt filled with darkness, puzzles, and lurking evil.

Location.Name: EntranceHall
Location.Title: Entrance Hall
Location.Introduction: You stand at the heavy stone doors of an ancient crypt. The air is stale, and torchlight flickers weakly.

Fact.Text: The stone walls are covered in moss and faded carvings.
A broken statue lies near the entrance, its eyes hollow.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: A dark corridor leads deeper into the crypt.

Fact.Text: Large skeletal remains lie scattered across the stone floor.
Two massive stone doors block passage north and east.
A glowing glyph pulses on the floor in the center of the room.

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Title: South
Exit.Description: The entrance hall lies to the south.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: A heavy stone door leads to a burial chamber.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: An arched hallway leads toward the puzzle room.

Fact.Text: Sarcophagi line the walls, some open, some sealed.
The scent of ancient decay clings to the air.
Scratches suggest something once crawled out of one of the tombs.

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Title: South
Exit.Description: The Guardian Chamber lies to the south.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: A narrow passage leads east toward a hidden vault.

Fact.Text: Gold glitters in piles, but several chests lie broken and empty.
A skeleton in ornate armor slumps near the back wall.
A locked iron door bars access to another room to the south.

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Title: South
Exit.Description: A locked door leads to the Ritual Circle.

Fact.Text: Four pillars each bear a strange symbol: sun, moon, flame, and shadow.
The room hums faintly with magical energy.
Stepping on the wrong tiles causes the floor to shake violently.

Exit.Name: West
Exit.Title: West
Exit.Description: The Guardian Chamber is to the west.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Title: East
Exit.Description: A shimmering portal pulses at the far end of the room.

Fact.Text: Vast crystals protrude from the floor and ceiling, glowing faintly.
The hum of magic is almost deafening here.
A massive shadowy creature watches you from the darkness.

Exit.Name: West
Exit.Title: West
Exit.Description: A shimmering portal leads back to the puzzle room.

Fact.Text: A blood-stained circle is etched into the stone floor.
Candles flicker despite the absence of wind.
Dark chanting echoes faintly though no one is visible.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: The vault lies north through the locked door.

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Title: South
Exit.Description: A tunnel leads down into the dungeon depths.

Fact.Text: The walls are damp and covered in claw marks.
Growls and the sound of shuffling echo through the dark.
Something ancient and powerful stirs here.

Exit.Name: North
Exit.Title: North
Exit.Description: A tunnel leads up to the ritual circle.

Object.Name: AncientKey
Object.Title: Ancient Key
Object.Description: An iron key covered in runes. It feels warm to the touch.

Object.Name: SapphireAmulet
Object.Title: Sapphire Amulet
Object.Description: An amulet with a glowing blue gem. Protects against shadow magic.

Object.Name: HealingPotion
Object.Title: Healing Potion
Object.Description: A small vial of red liquid. Restores vitality when consumed.

Object.Name: SilverBlade
Object.Title: Silver Blade
Object.Description: A finely crafted sword with ancient markings. Especially effective against undead.
